job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: The team works on multiple dimensionsbrbrUnique opportunity to work with open sourcebrWork on Security Onboarding and platform integrations with cutting edge Cloud security featuresbrKey responsibilities includebrbrWork on developing code samples in the areas of mTLS and authenticationbrWork on onboarding security features brbrMandatorybrExperienced with an opensource software development environment  Familiar with Golang  Bachelors in Engineering Computer Science is preferred or equivalence of industry experiencebrDesiredbrExperience in the following domain areas is a plus  Networking  AuthenticationIdentity  API Client development
